ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Lost Dugeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Usually the Mob in question spawns after about 60% or so of the dungeon has been cleared (so I hear) so killing the regular mobs quicker will give you more
ygData.messageBody:
Su wrote:
> I've only found a few problems and that's with LD.
> If any of your group members go LD during the crawl and can't get
> back on quickly you're pretty much screwed. And it's very difficult
> to do some of the adventures without a mezzer.
> And sometimes if you have to locate a mob and kill it before a certain
> time-period is up, the mob doesn't spawn until literally 3 minutes
> before time is up and you can't get to it before then. I haven't had
> much luck, but hopefully the next time I actually get to play I'll
> have better luck. I think the 7 level difference sucks though.
> luv,
> -Su

Usually the Mob in question spawns after about 60% or so of the dungeon
has been cleared (so I hear) so killing the regular mobs quicker will
give you more time to spare. And Track is your friend =)

Matt

Honig Wayfarer
65 Ranger
Cazic Thule
